scene.description: Ultra-photorealistic sunny balcony shot on a bright day in an urban apartment. Young woman squatting on the balcony floor, blowing a pink bubble gum bubble.

environment.location: urban apartment balcony with city view
elements: black wrought-iron railing with decorative swirls
large glass door/window behind reflecting city skyline and blue sky
visible city buildings with classic architecture in background
environment.lighting: bright natural midday sunlight – intense but flattering, warm glow on skin and hair, natural shadows on floor and body, subtle reflections on glass

photography.camera_style: iPhone photo taken by someone else or timer – candid playful moment, no phone or arm visible in frame
photography.angle: eye-level to slightly low, capturing squat pose and bubble gum
photography.texture: hyper-realistic skin with natural sunlight glow and subtle imperfections, glossy bubble gum, fabric details on clothing

pose.overall: squatting low on balcony floor with knees wide apart, weight balanced, torso upright with slight forward lean, playful and relaxed stance
pose.legs: deep squat position, thighs parallel to floor, one knee slightly higher
pose.right_arm: bent with hand near mouth blowing bubble gum
pose.left_arm: relaxed, hand resting on thigh or knee

subject.expression: eyes gently closed, lips forming round shape blowing large pink bubble gum bubble, playful and cute vibe
subject.hair: long loose blonde waves, natural and slightly windswept, falling over shoulders

clothing.top: white ribbed crop tank top, fitted with scoop neckline, showing midriff
clothing.bottom: very short white pleated tennis skirt/mini skirt, flaring out slightly
clothing.shoes: white Nike Air Jordan high-top sneakers with light accents

subject.bubble_gum: large pink bubble being blown, glossy and realistic with light reflections
